name: Bayswood
slogan: Bayswood is a leading designer and manufacturer of bespoke artificial floral and greenery
description: Bayswood is a leading designer and manufacturer of bespoke artificial floral and greenery. We bring imagination, creativity and new designs to the European retail market, drawing on years of experience in the United States.

jobs.title: Finance & Operation Manager
jobs.description:
•	Completing day-to-day book-keeping, creating invoices, and credit control (payables and receivables) 
•	Supporting the Managing Director to deliver monthly management accounts and report generation
•	Maintain current data sets for all product and supply chain costs  
•	Maintain up to date sales figures for all customers 
•	Responsibility for invoicing customers and tracking payments
•	Collating monthly sales data, analysing trends and supporting account management 
•	Broad office administration to support the team
•	Book-keeping experience is essential
•	Accounting software experience is essential (preferably Xero)
•	Highly accurate and efficient when dealing with numbers across stock management, costings and invoices
•	Experience using inventory management systems would be highly valuable (for example Locate)
•	Secure experience with Excel and analysing data 
•	Clear and confident communications skills - both written and spoken 
•	Razor-sharp attention to detail, with a quick and accurate ability to process data points 
•	Extremely organised with excellent time management skills to manage tight timeframes in this varied role 
•	Fast problem-solving skills when the unexpected happens
